name: Stephanie and the Enchanted Kingdom
description:
SHE'S BACK!!! AND THIS TIME SHE IS NOT ALONE!!!

Stephanie is back in another all-new adventure. An evil king has turned the enchanted kingdom into an evil land filled with enemies and traps. Stephanie now must go on a new adventure to defeat the enemies and take down the evil king to restore the enchanted kingdom back to its peaceful glory. This time however Stephanie will not go it alone. A new girl name Kendall will be alongside Stephanie to help save the enchanted kingdom.

Play as Stephanie or the new girl Kendall

15 new challenging levels

7 new special stages

new enemies and bosses

2 different endings

CONTROLS FOR STEPHANIE
Xbox Controller

D-pad = Move left or right, Duck down

A Button = Jump

Y Button = Run

Y Button While in air = Drop Kick

Keyboard

Arrow Keys = Move left or right down

X Key = Jump

Z Key = Run

Z Key while in air = Drop Kick

CONTROLS FOR KENDALL

Xbox Controller

D-Pad = Move Left or right, Duck down

A Button = Jump

Y Button = Run/Flip Attack

Down and Y Button = Slide

KEYBOARD

Arrow Keys = Move left or right down

X Key = Jump

Z Key = Run/Flip Attack

Down and Z Key = Slide

Special thanks to Christoph Jakob for the music and David Richard for the level design
